entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider releasing #107333 into dotnet 9 #109060
  • Cannot export RSAParameters from X509Certificate2 in .NET 9 RC2 #109059
  • GitHub bot has started pinging owners when the area of a closed issue changes. #109058
  • More precise option to identify CPU spikes/burst using Open Telemetry #109056
  • Behaviour of exceptions in `List<T>.LastIndexOf` doesn't match with documentation #109054

Closed

  • Length of the "White Heavy Check Mark" #109055
  • [API Proposal]: Infinite stack #109023
  • Add custom entry resolver when using `DllImportAttribute` #1906
  • [Perf] Regressions on Multiple platforms, 8/8/2024 11:52:00 PM #106345
    9.0.0
  • Performance Fundamental: Net 8 -> Net 9 Manual Comparison Report #106824
    9.0.0
  • Process.Start opens explorer itself instead of URL #108817

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete duplicate blank issue template. #109057
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.58, windows: 130.0.6723.59 #109053
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove ConcurrentDictionary lookups from Unix socket event loop #109052
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 10.0.0
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll more Equals/StartsWith/EndsWith on arm64 #109036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add tests for assigning dataflow values to generic parameters through MakeGenericType #106832
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • C#, Simplify init refactoring also for arrays #39218
    Backlog
  • Naming rule fix generates code with errors #39317
    Backlog
  • Visualizing Deferred Execution Calls in Visual Studio 2019 #39418
    Backlog

    Backlog
  • Refactor error #39374
    Backlog
  • VB.NET code pattern snippet works within interpolated strings #39176
    Backlog
  • VS replaces DateTime with Date #39172
    Backlog
  • Add ability to customize the xml comments format #39141
    Backlog
  • VB: Indenting of method parameters is broken inside lambda methods. #34511

  • Roslyn OOP does not use MEF part rejection #36396
    Backlog
  • [C# Feature Request] Show FlagAttribute and datatype of enums on hover #37861
    Backlog
  • cannot use local variable -continued- #38217
    Backlog
  • Include suffix in inserted text when completion item is committed #37960
    Backlog
  • Suggestion: Offer fix for upgrading project to Core 3 #35643
    Backlog
  • Need a long term solution for caching VS completion items #35160
    Backlog
  • Leave caret unchanged when applying ToggleBlockComment #36350
    Backlog
  • Quick actions show different options on selection #36756
    Backlog
  • "Time to all errors" much slower with VS versus rider/resharper #37205

  • Go to Definition of Add method for collection element initializers #39106

  • How to go to the same place from diff window to source window? #35005
    Backlog
  • Choose patterns and paradigms while developing code #38538
    Backlog
  • Task already completed exception in Workspace.TryApplyChanges #38936
    Backlog
  • MoveToNamespace should support moving a single type from global NS #38767
    Backlog
  • Expand selection on method should include XML docs #38762
    Backlog
  • Show Parameter Info should show the target type of an assignment #38707
    Backlog
  • Future enhancements for code actions to configure code style options and diagnostic severity in editorconfig #36348
    Backlog
  • Change field type #38634
    Backlog
  • Move AdditionalProperty to `Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.FindUsages` namespace as this is specific to FAR columns. #38528
    Backlog
  • Ruleset file corruption when using multi-select to set analyzer severity for first time in a project #38252
    Backlog
  • Provide special error message and/or code fix for when a variable is referenced on the same line that it's initialized. #38446
    Backlog
  • Add 'Remove Parameter' to Change Signature from Quick Action and Refactoring #38384
    Backlog
  • Symbols/Namespaces not being resolved #38157
    Backlog
  • Convert Get/Set to properties should give warning if possible Set method wasn't converted #38149
    Backlog
  • Suggest to convert if-statement to case-guard #38009
    Backlog
  • Refactoring to populate property initializer #38011
    Backlog
  • Editor for comments in C# code or any kind of code that Visual Studio handles #38028
    Backlog
  • CS7068: "Reference to type X claims it is defined in this assembly, but it is not defined" when compiling corefx #9893
    Backlog
  • `new SomeStruct(` should show user-defined overloads first in completion #37843
    Backlog
  • Refactor-to-New-Namespace doesn't work for C# types that are associated with XAML #35337
    Backlog
  • New [SuppressMessage] in source option not shown in Error List #37902
    Backlog
  • Generated code added at cursor instead of end of file, visual basic #37738
    Backlog
  • Intellisence doesn't show method argument when Use expression body for methods #37325
    Backlog
  • Avoid attempting to resolve URIs as SymbolKey #37500
    Backlog
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from Analyzers #36400
    Backlog
  • immediate window is case sensitive for VB #37350
    Backlog
  • Lambda type inference Error #37338
    Backlog
  • Move down one line when applying ToggleLineComment with no selection #36351
    Backlog
  • CommitFormatter can lead to deadlock #35553
    Backlog
  • ArgumentNullException in C# Interactive #36572
    Backlog
  • Adding #warning in this code causes Intellisense errors to appear #37479
    Backlog
  • Complete Statement should add missing closing delimiters #34052
    Backlog
  • Code Style Options set via Tools → Options do not automatically refresh #28581
    Backlog
  • Handle user-defined operators in 'use pattern-matching' analyzer #23374
    Backlog
  • Naming Styles don't have a way to make prefix optional (for example) #13349
    Backlog
  • Internal NullReferenceException in CSharpValidateFormatStringDiagnosticAnalyzer when using custom workspace without WorkspaceAnalyzerOptions #21886

  • Unneeded value assignment according to default constructor: Editorconfig rule and codefix #35589

  • Complete Statement should put semicolon at end of all postfix expressions #37578

  • Handle relative URIs in 'see href' #37501

  • Handle ImplicitStackAllocArrayCreationExpressionSyntax #37180

  • When moving a class, update the namespace #36912

  • VS 15.9.7 InvalidOperationException Unexpected Null #35435

  • Code navigation is broken in Peek window #35694

  • Use block body for getter not available in expression-bodied getter #36560

  • Use implicit type Fix All should simplify deconstructions #36468

  • No default selection enter key behavior radio buttons on IntelliSense pages #14597
    Backlog
  • Add "async" when using Generate Method on an await expression #14467
    Backlog
  • [Code Style] Give users more control over the visual treatments of each option #13963
    Backlog
  • Change signature fails to work with lambdas #13706
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in TryGetImageListAndIndex When Attempting to Apply Changes #33884
    Backlog
  • Autobrace completion should trigger autoformatting #33154
    Backlog
  • Use MSBuild Locator's AppDomainManager #36165

  • Find All References on a method parameters from an interface is inconsistent to methods from an interface #36227

  • Incorrect VB try/catch snippet applying in Visual Studio #35950

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The referenced MessagePack has a known vulnerability #58532
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext_spring #58531
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef, https #58530
  • HOT RELOAD ALWAYS BREAKING #58528
  • ElementReference.Id has wrong nullable annotation #58523

Closed

  • Perf improvement: single_query #58520
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #58522
  • Applying Authorize attribute to Blazor component only works on a page level. #58508
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #58490
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #58491

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update AOT profile on NET 9 GA branch #25403
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Remove excessive Comments from all Controls #25398

Closed

  • didn't find curly braces #25394
  • Unable to debug on iOS 18 DEVICE, Xcode 16, lots of warnings, won't hit breakpoints #25395
  • XCode 16/iOS 18 - Errors on launch and no debugging? #25228

PullRequests

Created

  • Add note to PR template about only targeting main #25402
  • Remove excessive BoxView API comments #25399
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement WaitForFirstElement method to UITest extension methods #25282
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement Pan method to UITest extension methods #25312
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement QueryUntilPresent method to UITest extension methods #25314
    area-testing
  • Fix Titlebar name API and add templates #25390
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25401
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25295
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Disable TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation on Device Tests #25400
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265

Updated

  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    community ✨
  • Set title on maui-blazor template window #25387
    area-templates

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cascading saving Nth level changing child #34941
  • Mapping Option<T> to nullable column #34940

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer 9.0-rc2 downgraded the Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.6 and drastically slow for large data set #34939

PullRequests
